azurerm_eventhub_namespace_authorization.description: Manages an Authorization Rule for an Event Hub Namespace.

name.description: Specifies the name of the Authorization Rule. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

namespace_name.description: Specifies the name of the EventHub Namespace. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which the EventHub Namespace exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

listen.description: Grants listen access to this this Authorization Rule. Defaults to `false`.

send.description: Grants send access to this this Authorization Rule. Defaults to `false`.

manage.description: Grants manage access to this this Authorization Rule. When this property is `true` - both `listen` and `send` must be too. Defaults to `false`.

id.description: The EventHub Namespace Authorization Rule ID.

primary_key.description: The Primary Key for the Authorization Rule.

primary_connection_string.description: The Primary Connection String for the Authorization Rule.

secondary_key.description: The Secondary Key for the Authorization Rule.

secondary_connection_string.description: The Secondary Connection String for the Authorization Rule.

create.description: Used when creating the EventHub Namespace Authorization Rule.

update.description: Used when updating the EventHub Namespace Authorization Rule.

read.description: Used when retrieving the EventHub Namespace Authorization Rule.

delete.description: Used when deleting the EventHub Namespace Authorization Rule.
